com.db.chart.model

Class ChartSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.model.ChartSet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarSet, LineSet

    public abstract class ChartSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Data model containing ChartEntry elements to be used by ChartView.
